overview: Family relationships of a New Mexico family  are just one part of this silent cowboy western about a war veteran who finds a goldmine.  He wants to earn enough money to take care of his young son, but crooked officials swindle him out of the mine, and then his son is killed.  He swears vengeance and joins up with Mexican bandit, "Pancho Zapilla", who intends to destroy his whole town.
title: The Patriot
